title: The TJ Ritchie Show : Newsom & Bass Erupt Over ICE
body_text:
The TJ Ritchie Show: Newsom & Bass Erupt Over ICE
The TJ Ritchie Show: Newsom & Bass Erupt Over ICE
The TJ Ritchie Show is a nighty talk show on WBT Charlotte that covers news and politics, along with everything happening in entertainment, sports, and…well…life! Because he’s “America’s Coolest Conservative,” TJ breaks it all down in a way that everyone can understand and enjoy, delivering pinpoint political analysis with wit and a heaping dose of Southern charm. Not since Rush Limbaugh has a host combined serious political and cultural news with satirical humor. He has been one of America’s most well-respected radio hosts for over 25 years, and now he’s conquering the talk radio and podcast world. Liberals beware…you just might laugh at yourselves! There’s a new Sheriff in town, and his name is TJ Ritchie!
https://shows.amperwavepodcasting.com/the-radio-button/the_radio_button/tj_ritchie_show
Hour 1
Segment 1:
Subject: TJ talks about wanting to go with Breaking Brett Jensen to a political press conference sometime. He also talks about the University of North Carolina Tar Heel football team, led by Bill Belichick.
Segment 2:
Subject: TJ shares a clip of Cali Gov. Newsom raging over ICE showing up before his press conference about redistricting in California in response to Texas redistricting. Then he shares LA Mayor Karen Bass’ response to the ICE agents, she was even more irate than Newsom. The mayor calls President Trump disrespectful, a comment which TJ immediately follows up with another clip of the mayor calling for ICE agents and their families to be murdered.
Segment 3:
Subject: The democrats are reviving the global warming narrative as they search for anything to grasp onto. Once again, our plastic straws are killing the turtles, a factoid which originated with a young girl’s class presentation.
Segment 4:
Subject: TJ talks more about the big green scam. TJ also shares an embarrassing personal story.
Hour 2
Segment 1:
Subject: TJ on The News: Shock as man discovers he’s been living with a knife in his chest for 8 YEARS. Suspicious women hire me as a honey trap to test if their boyfriends will cheat—it’s shocking how fast men fold. Lynnwood police say a DoorDash driver on meth crashed car into a tree before setting it on fire. The Man with the World’s Largest Junk Broke His Arm, and His Enormous Package Caused It.
Segment 2:
Subject: Kate from Jon and Kate plus 8 lives on Lake Norman these days and is regaining popularity since joining TikTok.
Segment 3:
Subject: TJ shares a clip of one of the smartest Senators in the country, John Kennedy, from Louisiana. The brilliant senator has a recommendation for Sen. Chuck Schumer and Sen. Hakeem Jeffries that shocked the room. TJ then shares a shocking article from a left-wing rag about Governor Ron DeSantis killing veterans.
Segment 4:
Subject: DOJ employee charged with felony assault of an ICE agent when he threw a Subway sandwich at the agent. Said DOJ employee is indeed no longer employed by the federal government.
